column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
is a UI for screen adjustment.
is a suckless notification system.
is a minimalist image viewer and background setter.
is an ASCII toy.
gives vim ability to use X clipboard.
can highlight code output.
is the main graphical user interface and window manager.
updates pacman's mirrorlist with options.
is my favorite mono font.
provides sans and serif fonts.
hides an inactive mouse.
gives the special escape/super mappings of LARBS.
is for transparency and removing screen-tearing.
is the graphical server.
starts the graphical server.
can set x preferences like autorepeat rate.
is a package that gives the system unicode symbols and emojis used in the status bar and elsewhere.
provides unicode and emoji symbols.
is my custom build of the suckless terminal emulator.
